title: China's industrial profits fall by 10% in October as deflation worries linger
content: Industrial profits are a key gauge of the financial health of factories, mines and utilities in China.

title: New Zealand expectedly cuts benchmark rate by 50 basis points as economy struggles
content: New Zealand's central bank slashed its benchmark interest rate by 50 basis points to 4.25%, marking a third straight cut to its benchmark interest rate.
summary: New Zealand's central bank slashed its benchmark interest rate by 50 basis points to 4.25%, marking a third straight cut to its benchmark interest rate.

title: The shipping industry is wrestling with one of its largest challenges
content: The shipping industry is contending with a shortage of seafarers, and it's fueling a troubling mix of fake resumes, accidents at sea, and higher freight rates.
summary: The shipping industry is contending with a shortage of seafarers, and it's fueling a troubling mix of fake resumes, accidents at sea, and higher freight rates.

title: Israel-Hezbollah permanent ceasefire has been accepted, Biden says
content: Israel and Lebanon have agreed to a permanent ceasefire in cross-border hostilities between the Jewish state and Hezbollah militants.

title: Can Saudi Arabia keep pace with its ambitious mega-project spending spree?

title: Workday stock slips on light quarterly forecast

title: Trump vows an additional 10% tariff on China, 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico
content: The president-elect plans to raise tariffs by an additional 10% on all Chinese goods coming into the U.S., according to a post on his social media platform Truth Social.

title: Bitcoin slides toward $90,000 as price moves back after postelection rally

title: Meet the start-up working to save newborn babies and democratize pregnancy care
content: More than two million babies died in the first 20 days of their lives in 2022, and a startup, Biorithm, hopes to help prevent this with its monitoring device.

title: Databricks closes in on multibillion funding round at $55 billion valuation to help employees cash out

title: Huawei launches first phones capable of running its new self-developed operating system

title: Six travelers in Laos died from suspected tainted alcohol. Here's where most incidents occur
